Song.Title: Don't Close Your Eyes
Song.Lyrics:
I know you loved him
A long time ago
Even now in my arms
You still her want her I know

But darlin this time
Let your memories die
When you hold me tonight
Don't close your eyes

Chorus-
Don't close your eyes
Let it be me
Don't pretend its her
In some fantasy
Darlin' just once
Let yesterday just go
And you'll find more love
Than you've ever known
Just hold me tight
When you love me tonight
Don't close your eyes

Maybe i've been a fool
Holding on all this time
Lying here in your arms
Though she's in your mind
But I kee hoping someday
That you'll see the light
Let it be me tonight
Don't close your eyes

Chorus-
Don't close your eyes
Let it be me
Don't pretend its her
In some fantasy
Darlin' just once
Let yesterday just go
And you'll find more love
Than you've ever known
Just hold me tight
When you love me tonight
Don't close your eyes

Chorus-
Don't close your eyes
Let it be me
Don't pretend its her
In some fantasy
Darlin' just once
Let yesterday just go
You'll find more love
Than you've ever known
Just hold me tight
When you love me tonight
Don't close your eyes
